CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Stagwell Inc is the challenger holding company built to transform marketing. It delivers scaled creative performance for the world's most ambitious brands, connecting culture-moving creativity with leading-edge technology to harmonize the art and science of marketing.
